text: Charles Jeffaries "Charlie" Stayt (born 19 June 1962) is a British newsreader and broadcaster. ==Works== He was a presenter alongside Naga Munchetty for BBC Breakfast. ==Early life and education== Stayt was born on 19 June 1962 in Gloucester, West England. He has two older brothers and sisters. He was educated at Wycliffe College, a co-educational boarding independent school in Stonehouse, Gloucestershire, before going to Birmingham Polytechnic. Category:1962 births Category:Living people
title: Charlie Stayt
